website_summaries.verdict: When paired with a low latency Bluetooth receiver, this transmitter eliminates audio lag.
pros: Works as both a transmitter and a receiver, giving any compatible device the ability to make use of Bluetooth
Built-in battery will deliver 10 hours of continuous use
Continues working even while you're charging the battery
cons: Some difficulties in making the transmitter pair with certain devices

customer_reviews.title: My favorite air travel upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the Nintendo Switch but what made me really love it was in flight entertainment. It declutters your whole flight experience; less hassle with the trays, meals, people getting up to go to the bathroom, etc. It's small and light enough that I just leave it dangling by the audio cord (in flight or on the Switch.) The battery lasts longer than my bluetooth headphones plus it can charge while operating so battery life isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics -> PS4 Controller -> any Bluetooth device!
customer_reviews.text: Very SATISFIED. Exactly what I wanted. I'm using it for Bluetooth TX, but it can be switched to RX and has a variety of adapters.
customer_reviews.author: cmt

customer_reviews.title: I was about to buy a new TV.
customer_reviews.text: This device worked just as I needed it to. I have a surround sound system throughout the house with wired speakers and a TV in my kitchen which is where normally sit to watch the games and such. I needed to be able to connect my TV to the stereo/surround sound to get better sound while watching a games, in the kitchen hanging out with family and friends. This device made the connections easily and so far I can't see any delay. It may be because it a proximity of my device and the surround sound (less than 3ft),but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Blahk68

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to connect but so worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome. My fiancé and I can’t do without it when we are traveling— we use it to connect two sets of Bluetooth headphones to the same device to watch movies or tv together. There’s a great video tutorial online for how to connect two devices that don’t have an interface to actually select the transmitter for pairing, which helped us a lot because it’s a little tricky. Once you connect the first time it’s almost automatic though. I’ve also used it to get Bluetooth audio in my car, and to transmit from a record player to a Bluetooth speaker. The uses are endless and this little box has become invaluable for us!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to transmit and receive for the various applications I use it for. Proved to be much more versatile and of a higher quality than some more expensive transmitters I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Buddy Hinkley II

customer_reviews.title: This is great little device
customer_reviews.text: This is great little device, it will make your sound system Bluetooth . Now you can listen to your device via wireless. There is one thing you need to check for on your device. It must allow your device to send the sound out to non speaker type device. Some sound systems will ONLY go to speakers. Example: My TV (Samsung 32") will only allow sound to go to external speakers. This TV is not a top of the line it is for bedroom use only. So if you need Bluetooth and your system allows the sound out to non speaker devices, this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to adapt my AirPod Pros
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent flier I bought a pair of AirPods Pro hoping to finally leave my bulky Bose QC behind. I quickly realized that if I wanted to use my Nintendo Switch, the inflight entertainment system, etc I wouldn’t be able to since they require a wired connection. This Bluetooth TX/RX helped solve that problem. Paired it up with my AirPods Pro and now can leave the Bose behind. I was a little worried that maybe there would be latency/sync issues. In the videos I have played and the games I have tried on my switch it is imperceptible. The device is super light weight and compact as well. I attached some photos to show the scale.
customer_reviews.author: AV8TR

customer_reviews.title: High Pitched Noise
customer_reviews.text: There is a high pitched noise that comes out of the speakers when paired with this device. It is most definitely the device making the noise because it does not make the noise when the speakers are connected to my phone. We are very disappointed since this adapter had such good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Has very noticable signal delay
customer_reviews.text: Unit works ok, but has a signal delay enough to see the lips move on tv before hearing the words. I originally bought this to play my guitar thru a pre-amp and into my blue tooth headphones. Big delay in signal making it impossible to do. Went back to using my 900Mhz wireless headphones, no delay there.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: A very good product...I did have a problem the 1st time...It took 10mins to get it to work...once it worked I have used the transmitter to hook up to my Bluetooth headphones...also used it to my Bluetooth speaker(hooked up to Samsung tv 46'' 8000 series ...Onkyo tx sr606 receiver headphone jack)...I didn't have any Bluetooth equipment until I read about your product and took a chance...for less than $30.00 I was really impressed how well it transmitted to headphones and speaker...too bad that it can transmit to 2 devices at once...I have also bought a transmitter only device too... I really like like this product...I would buy this product again...thanks
customer_reviews.author: davbetty

customer_reviews.title: ... transmitter the night I got it & it worked fine, second night it would not pair with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Connected the transmitter the night I got it & it worked fine, second night it would not pair with my wireless headphones. Check to see if my headphones were working okay, & it connected to my cell with no problems. I tried again to pair with my headphones & still did not connect. Returning & trying a different brand. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: couchpotato

customer_reviews.title: Great transmitter!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about purchasing a Bluetooth transmitter because I had heard they can be disappointing. Fortunately that wasn’t the case with the TaoTronics - it works great. My husband is quite the audiophile and is very difficult to please but he was very impressed with the sound quality when he used this with his iPod. Haven’t used it as a receiver yet but as a transmitter we’re very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: sls

customer_reviews.title: Out of box failure
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out of the box... wouldn't charge so item was completely useless. Tried charging for several hours (documentation said charge for 2) and still didn't work. Since the item has generally high rating I'll give it another shot once the refund is processed and will adjust rating if new one lives up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: rixmax

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable latency
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly small and compact but I purchased this to watch/listen wireless to movies and play video games and there is a noticeable latency between what's happening on screen and when you hear it. My experience is from 4-5 feet away (from transmitter to my headset). If I had to guess, the latency is between 0.25 and 0.5 seconds so, if you're watching a movie, the lip syncing will be off and can be distracting. Now with that being said, if you plan on using this to just listen, this is an exceptional product. Sound quality is good, it's small and durable, and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Connect, Good Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: This was very simple to install - nothing to it. Connected right away, and was able to broadcast excellent quality sound to my headphones immediately. I used it for TV sound - just plugged it in and charged it up, connected to headphones, and boom - instant sound IN the headphones, no sound in the room. Perfect. Also, charge lasted okay - completely through a long evening of sitting and watching/listening. The next night (didn't charge in between) it faded a bit after 3 hours, but that's to be expected - had to charge it right up then it worked fine. Highly recommend it - good piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: M. Long

customer_reviews.title: Connected via cable box not tv
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung tv is not Bluetooth enabled. We wanted wireless speakers to connect to TV. Best Buy sales rep told me couldn't be done. However YouTube video showed me how. So I bought the TaoTronics Bluetooth 4.1 Transmitter and Receiver, 2-in-1 Wireless 3.5mm Adapter and my Wi-Fi/Bluetooth speakers. I couldn't get it to pair per instructions but that was because I have a cable box connected to TV. Plugged the tanker into the cable box and it paired quickly to the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: RgPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Works fine & easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks later it still works exactly as advertised in transmitting from amplifier to my bluetooth headphones. The set-up and pairing was fairly easy (I'm not all that tech savvy; but I figured it out within minutes.) The transmission works everywhere in my smallish apartment, even through 2 walls.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: it works! but! the first problem.. ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: received replacement and works perfect out of the box.... didn't fall apart on me... also no more static sound while charging via TV USB port... Thank You for fast responds... bumping to 5 stars. it works! but! the first problem... when I inserted the jack plug into device... the top plate with the switch fell out ;( all I did was push the jack plug in... this is brand new product and already seen the guts of it. the other problem I am having is a static noise when I plug the USB into TV USB outlet to charge it...
customer_reviews.author: cub4bearin

customer_reviews.title: Easy connectivity and works great and priced below others
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it all the time to watch television late at night or when I'm doing something that makes a lot of noise such as dishes or vacuuming while I'm watching television. It is so easy to pair up with my Skullcandy speaker and my earphones the customer service was absolutely the best I have ever experienced purchasing an online product. Tori was very helpful in confirming what else I needed to get so that it works with Netflix and Amazon Prime videos. I highly recommend this product and mostly highly recommend purchasing it from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dislibros

customer_reviews.title: I bought my dad a 4K LG Smart TV for Christmas one year and a pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my dad a 4K LG Smart TV for Christmas one year and a pair of Bluetooth headphones the following year so he could hear his tv from his desk at the back of the family room. The problem was that the tv did not have Bluetooth transmitting capability, so I purchased this little device to fix the problem. Low and behold, the only output on the tv for sound would not work for this device, but thankfully the cable box saved the day. Now he can listen to his football game from the back of the room without the rest of us in the house having to hear it as well!
customer_reviews.author: lsmoondancer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This device is great! I’ve used it in both tx and rx modes. It works with my BT headphones to watch late night tv without keeping others awake. So as long as your set has an analogue audio out jack this will work. I usually use it with my old Bose radio/cd player on the aux input line so I can stream music to it from my iPad or iPhone. The battery life seems adequate, but have not tried to run it down, and you can use it while it’s being charged so not really an issue. I’m definitely thinking of getting another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: john L

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that transmits as well as having a backup receiver to my primary unit. I hook this up to my projector before I had to run a cord across the living room and people kept stepping on it. Plug this thing into the projector 3.5 headphone jack set to transmit and now I can utilize Bluetooth functionality without the cord Laying across the living room would highly recommend it if you're trying to get sound somewhere and don't want to run a lot of wires across the floor

customer_reviews.title: Projector screen over to bluetooth soundbar. Works Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my projector so I didn't have to run 3.5mm sound cable all the way to the front of the room where my sound bar is. It works great. THe only issue is you can't charge it while using, otherwise you get a very high pitch sound that ruins the movie. To solve this, I use a separate usb power pack up on the projector to charge it. The other downside, it you have to hold the button down for a few seconds to get it to connect after powering on. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: too much static
customer_reviews.text: easy to understand instructions and using for the first time. Unfortunately there was so much static that I was unable to watch television shows and movies without continuous interruption. I will be returning and searching for a new product
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great little device with a ton of uses
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make an older Samsung tv bluetooth compatible with a tower speaker across a room for grandparents. Struggle a bit then read some reviews on amazon; and one suggested plugging it into the cable box; worked like a dream. The whole room of people lit up on Thanksgiving when the sound started coming from across the room! We used it in transmit mode on the cable box with the red and white plugs female ends on the box and the USB charging cable plugged in all the time so grandparents won't have to worry about dead batteries. Shipping was well packed and came exactly when we expected. Would buy again; one for us to use on airplanes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mybecka

customer_reviews.title: Flights will never be the same...
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm on flights. Paired with both AirPods and Jabra 75t Elite. You won’t regret purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Nielson

customer_reviews.title: I almost never write reviews but this one was a must, please read.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in preparation for my gf visiting me from far away, we ride on my bike across the East Coast and i bought this device to connect to two bluetooth headphones so we can listen to the same songs as we ride around. I tested it at home and yes it does connect two devices so i thought i was set. When we actually had to use it tho, it disconnected after 1-2 minutes. We reconnected it many times with the same result, disconnect after a min or two, and since this is it's only purpose, i rate this as complete garbage, do not waste your money on it. thanks for reading this far, Georgi
customer_reviews.author: Georgi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound is off a bit. could not be synchronized. Revised on 8/11/2018 Right after I wrote my review here, I was contacted by the seller. They did apologize for my discontent with the product. They fully explained how it works and now I understand better its performance. I also received a full refund for my purchase. Thanks for the amazing customer service. I will recommend this product 100 % if you use it as a Bluetooth transceiver / receiver for your music audio devises!! Note: As for your video devises, unless you won't mind a bit of audio delayed, I will not give 100% although it will do the job. Thank you Sunvalley Brands Customer Care staff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive marketing, AptX LL in TX ONLY
customer_reviews.text: The product description mentions AptX LL support. However, AptX LL is only supported when the device is in TX mode. In RX mode, only AAC or SBC works. If paired with another receiver, it seems to work only in SBC (there's no obvious way to verify which codec is in use since no forms of indicators are available) as the receiver does not support AAC in TX. Therefore if you plan to use a pair of these, you WILL suffer significant audio latency. If you plan to use this as a receiver with a relatively recent phone as a transmitter, latency won't be as bad, but it's still noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: IanLim

customer_reviews.title: Great for Switch lite
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised when it came that it was really small but worked great I personally use it with my AirPods and Nintendo switch lite so if your buying it for that I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia 🧸

customer_reviews.title: Not great for cell phone or PC, unless you just want to hear some sounds via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: 1. It looks like design for TV which usually have very strong AMP/audio level. I have a desktop AMP I usually use -36dB for my headphone but I need to have it set to +5dB in order to hear anything. Keep in mind that you will need a very strong audio output level (TV usually have). 2. As a audio output device, the pairing process is very intuitive and after that, connecting still take quite some time. 3. My device has very strong noise while charging and using as a transmitter. The charging circuit must be not well isloated, this kindof could solve by increasing the output level from the source, making the first point even worse.
customer_reviews.author: kice

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! BUY THIS ONE INSTEAD!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS ONE .....NOT the "Upgraded Version TaoTronics Portable Bluetooth Transmitter for TV, AptX Low Latency Wireless Audio Adapter for 3.5mm Stereo, Pairs Bluetooth Headphones/Speakers" THIS ONE IS MUCH BETTER AND ACTUALLY WORKS. So, spend the extra $10 to get this one with the 5.0 bluetooth version instead, it's well worth it. Sounds great, no connection issues. I first mistakenly bought the cheaper one that doesn't have bluetooth 5.0 and immediately regretted it because it didn't work. So, I returned it and bought This unit and it works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little device
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I thought I had ordered the wrong item. I was replacing one that was 6 times larger and had an antenna, that had stopped connecting to my Bose speaker. This one connects quickly, but the sound doesn’t start for about 15 seconds. Thought I had a problem until it happened every time. As a hole it does what I need it to. My hearing isn’t what it used to be so I hook it to the headphone output from my surround sound system amp and send the signal to my Bose Bluetooth speaker by my sofa. I can now watch and hear my TV without waking up the neighborhood / wife..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with sound quality when using this with my exercise bike. I contacted their support and got right through to someone who was very helpful. She suggested that I try a different 3.5mm cable than the one that came with the device. When I did that it worked fine. I have now used it for one hour long workout with no issues. I gave it 4 stars instead of five because I think that the cable in the box should have worked. It may just be a quirk of my bike but the first cable I pulled out of my cable drawer worked fine so I don't see why theirs wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics Bluetooth : I've had no problems with this at all. A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well overall for the price. I've had no problems with connectivity or volume. Transmitting and receiving functions worked equally well for me. I use this for my hdtv and a bluetooth stereo headset. It’s reliable.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Works great (once you figure it out)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a long flight this summer, which was cancelled due to COVID. I used the audio cables to hook it up to my tv instead, and sometimes I use it with my noise cancelling bluetooth headphones if my neighbors are being a little loud. It works and sounds great. The only downside is that the instructions are terrible and it took many tries (on different days) to get it to work. I swear I tried the combination of cables and modes I'm using now and they didn't work initially , so I have no clue how to reconnect if I ever unplugged it from my tv!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT pair with Bose 700 Bluetooth Headphones but GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these and they’ve all worked great. I gifted one to my stepdad so he could use his new Bose 700 Bluetooth Headphones with his old Bose Receiver connected to his TV. We tried and tried and tried to get the headphones to pair with the device and never could make it happen. We reset both, cleared out pairing history, and tried everything we could find online. So disappointed. UPDATE 3/9/20: Seller responded to me personally, stating I probably received a defective unit and replaced my unit with a newer model. Received it next-day delivery. Great customer service and I recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Best part for me the quality of the signal the audio, Ritch and clear, awesome. I will update if any changes a rise;
customer_reviews.text: Ok then I received the transmitter late yesterday and so far I love it and seems of good quality of make. It comes with all the instructions needed pluse a cable i did not know about a cable that could connect to my older home receiver cable has a left and right rca connectors for the auxiliary port on in the back which i am using now and very happy with its performance. I have not tried to the tx part connecting 2 Bluetooth devices which i did not need but will try anyway soon overall i am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Michael l

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a great product that works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new Sony flat-screen TV, (supposedly) Bluetooth-capable, but I could not get any of my pairs of Bluetooth headphones to connect to it so that I could watch TV without disturbing the neighbors (thin walls) or my wife (thin patience for anything above louder than a 6 on the volume). So I did some searching and found this. It's easy to connect, right out of the box, and a single charge is good for several hours of TV watching. Really glad to have found a reasonably priced and reliable solution to being able to watch TV without disturbing anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Perry

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver works good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver to pair with Taotronics TT-BH090 headphones and they connected\paired quickly. However on my NEW TV it does not have a 3.5 audio out plug for the cables they provided, I only have an Optical out. I ended up swapping my transmitters on both my TVs to make things work as my older tv did have a 3.5 audio out plug. I wish this came with a audio out Optical to 3.5 cable. In time i will probably buy one on Amazon because they are only $5-$10 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a tech person. My goal was to watch tv, but have the sound come through my bluetooth headphones, and this item works perfectly to let me do that. I haven't used this device for anything else, so I can't comment on any other uses, but for me, this item is just what I needed. Note: because of the input ports on this thing, for some tv's you'll also need to get a digital-to-analog audio converter. That converter will plug into the tv and then into the Bluetooth transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: This does what it says it does and well!
customer_reviews.text: This TaoTronics Bluetooth transmitter and reciever works great. I have used both functions. I have had it connected to my pre-internet receiver and been able to connect my phone and or kindle or tablet to it. Also You can actually connect the transmitter to 2 Bluetooth devices simultaneously. Also great in the car for streaming from devices that don't have bluetooth! Battery last a long time. It has never died on me after hours of use. I also use it at work, where I can connect my music device to the soundboard at the back of theater during show rehearsals for playback while I am at the stage. Highly recommend this device to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Static sound with Airpods and won't pair after only 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was happily using this with my Vizio TV and airpods for the past 6 weeks - I started having a low level static (like a humming sound) about a week ago that would usually resolve if I re-paired it again with my airpods, it was annoying but workable. But tonight it stopped pairing with my airpods. I followed all the trouble shooting and even tried other airpods (my hubby has the latest ones) and headphones - nothing would pair. I've contacted TaoTronics customer serves and asked what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It DOES pair with airpods/bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the abundance of vague and unhelpful "answers" in the question section of this product page, this transmitter DOES pair with airpods. I was having trouble finding instructions, as the ones that come with the product are a little too general. If you're trying to pair the transmitter to airpods, make sure it's in TX mode and search Google using "[this product name] + airpods pairing". It pairs well when I cast with my phone or my laptop, and I can even adjust the volume. It works!
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPad use on Airplane
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPad 6th Generation. Purchased this specifically to use on the airplane for a trip so my daughter and I could watch movies on my iPad that I had downloaded. We both have AirPods. After doing a "practice test" at home before my trip, I can say this successfully worked extremely well. We were both able to use our Bluetooth AirPods to watch all our movies. One thing to note, we had to turn off our Bluetooth capabilities on the iPad for this device to work and then pair the device with each of our AirPods. Highly recommend this splitter. It's small and lightweight, held it's charge for our 5 hour flight.
customer_reviews.author: hsinglanjin

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far!
customer_reviews.text: This works well so far. It’s small and out of the way. It comes with an RCA cable and 3.5mm jack, is easy to pair and the sound is good and there is no delay (tha5 I can tell). However, one thing I noticed is that when you plug the included usb cable into the same device your transmitting from, there is a noticeable high pitch. It’s very distracting. It’s not present when you plug the usb cable to a normal power supply, though.
customer_reviews.author: J. San

customer_reviews.title: Simply marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a gadget that would prolong the life span of my Power House Hardon Kardon audio receiver by having Bluetooth capabilities for audio streaming and the Toatronic Bluetooth adapter does the job exceptionally well. Also, it is extremely small and remains out of sight if you need it to. The clarity is great and I have not experienced any sound quality issues at all. The distance is great as well, I went upstairs with my phone and it kept playing audio on my receiver. I love it when a product does what it is meant to do and keeps its promise.
customer_reviews.author: mayra cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Great if you enjoy listening to static
customer_reviews.text: Using in transmitter mode to connect a bedroom tv to an oontzangle speaker bought at the same time. Worked great for maybe a month with good clear sound and no noticeable lag. It's grafually developed a static problem which is now at the point of making this totally unusable. I can't take the fuzz anymore. Connected the speaker to other things and it works fine. I do not recommend this product and I'm shopping for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the 3.5mm cable
customer_reviews.text: Update: Opportunity came up to use this again. Turns out the 3.5mm audio cable that came with the unit was bad, and that's why the sound quality was horrible. Swapped out cables and the quality is fine when using as a receiver. Haven't used as a transmitter yet. --- Audio playback quality is very poor. I use it in my car, and it cuts out for a few seconds maybe two or three times a song. Sub-par radio quality audio is better. Won't be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Updated item worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Was elated with respect to the ease of setup and size of the item. Unfortunately in TX mode, there is about a 1/4 of a second lag (250ms). While this is ok when listening to music or listening to radio, watching TV is extremely annoying when you can see people talk ahead of the sound. This is advertised as low latency (which is ~40 ms) . It clearly is not. Pity, would've been 5 stars otherwise. Update. After writing this review, the company contacted me and offered to replace the item which they did and the replacement worked perfectly. Thanks much. Changed my review to 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Psychgirl

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Bose SOUNDLINK MINI 2
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK ON BOSE SOUNDLINK MINI 2. Look for TROND version of this exact same product. That one works with this speaker. :) UPDATE 5/12/20: The company kindly reached out to me and gave me detailed directions on how to connect the Bluetooth Transmitter to the Bose Speaker. However, despite numerous attempts, it still did not work. That being said, it was pretty great to have the company reach out to me and give me detailed instructions on how to troubleshoot the problem. I've increased the stars from 3 to 4. All in all, very decent customer service. Unfortunately, the product did not work with my favorite Bose speaker (it worked with every other speaker I own, though).
customer_reviews.author: Kade Platta

customer_reviews.title: Nice little receiver/transmitter
customer_reviews.text: These blue tooth devices are great. I use mine for both transmitting from and to older devices that don't have built in blue tooth. I had one before that I lost, but it was connected to my desktop to transmit to my bose headphones, connected to my laptop to transmit to my headphones, connected to my older stereo to receive from my cell phone.. all worked great, so much so I bought another when I lost my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Rman Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BT transmitter/receiver
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit - the first one was used as a receiver for an older car without BT. This one I used as a transmitter for a wireless connection to the TV sound on an airplane to pair with my wireless earbuds. In all cases, the units perform flawlessly and are easy to connect. I had a problem at first connecting this unit, so I emailed customer support. I received a reply within hours with detailed instructions. It turns out, the problem was with the earbuds I was pairing with the unit. After a factory reset of the earbuds, everything worked perfectly. Customer tech support is excellent. I would highly recommend this company and this BT receiver/transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Effective, Compact, Nifty, Multi-Purpose, & a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I can watch TV, or a movie, while my husband sleeps, without waking him. It's very effective for this purpose.I also like how it can turn my car radio into a speaker phone; because my radio is not itself Bluetooth enabled. It's a neat little device. The ability to transmit to 2 Bluetooth devices is super cool. We can watch a movie with the sound as loud as we individually want it (with 2 different blue tooth headphones with their own volume controls. And as loud as it might be for us, the neighbors don't hear a thing, except our laughter. I recommend this product. It is a good value; and performs as described.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Channing

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: Tried several different headphones and configurations, result: Good for music listening, kind of OK for Videos (video/audio sync is a little, worse depending on quality of headphones), not at all usable for live applications, delay is TOO great, Really awesome for music listening, pre-recorded sound. For me the even the video/audio delay was enough to be annoying for watching action sets. If you're background listening to the news or some benign video might not matter. I had some live applications in mind, musical instruments, DJ'ing, etc. Delay seems to great even with high end headphones.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: perfect for music not so much for movies
customer_reviews.text: i got this thing for my projector since mine didn't have built-in Bluetooth. i first test it with music. everything was fine. next i test it on a movie. the audio/video was sync fine for about 30 minutes then it unsync, the audio was delay by almost a full 2 second. it ruins the movie experience i try to get. you can fix this but turning off both the adapter and speaker and returning it on. the second problem is the battery. it says it can last up to 10 hours. it didn't. it lasts 5-6 hours tops, not even with full volume. maybe at 20-25% volume. other than the 2 problems. this is a great little device.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis.F

customer_reviews.title: Made my older HD TV Bluetooth capable
customer_reviews.text: I have an older HD TV that didn't have Bluetooth capability. I could listen to programming via the Firestick with my wireless headphones, but not movies through the DVD player. I purchased this and plugged it into the "Audio Out" port for wired headphones and it works fantastic. I can listen to everything I watch now through the wireless headphones. I'm not real tech savvy so wasn't sure what to expect. Setting up the connection to my headphones was very easy. After some reading I thought I might experience delayed transmission/lag to the headphones, but I haven't noticed any of the sound/speech being out of sync with what I'm watching. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Makes all my non Bluetooth devices capable of connecting wirelessly. I have an old iPod that works well with this device so I can use my wireless bluetooth headphone with it using this innovative device. This also works well as a receiver; I've hooked up my car's stereo using the auxiliary inputs and paired the device with my iphone and it works beautifully. Very well done!
customer_reviews.author: R. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Really small and compact bluetooth receiver and transmitter
customer_reviews.text: This is a really small compact sized bluetooth transmitter and receiver. It is well-made with a silicone textured exterior. I am using this to make my non-bluetooth stereo hi-fi system into a bluetooth one. I paired my iPhone to the device in the 'receiving/rx mode' and then connected it to AUX port of the hi-fi system using the included 3.5mm Audio cable and the 3.5mm female to 2 RCA Male Cable. Another use for me was plugging my regular non-bluetooth headphones into the device's 3.5mm headphone jack and pairing it in 'receiving/rx mode' with my iPhone. In either case, I had no issues pairing the device and the sound that went through sounded fine.
customer_reviews.author: NWMTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was a little bummed when I realized instead of 3.5mm or RCA jacks, the only "audio" out on my television is "optical/digital". I was on the verge of ordering a converter when the light bulb went off. I looked on the back of my Dish receiver and Viola! I plugged the transmitter into the RCA jacks on the receiver and I've got Bluetooth. Very happy with the sound quality and the range seems to be further than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: overall great device
customer_reviews.text: This is a great aid for devices that don't have built in Bluetooth. It's pairs quite easily and remembers the two headphones I paired to it without having to re-pair them. The battery life is extraordinary, I have used it for 12 continuous hours and still had power to spare. The range appears better than described, I have been able to go up to and maybe over 50ft away without losing fidelity. Also don't experience much interference when outside unlike some other BT devices I have used. I haven't used the transmitting function yet, but if it's comparable with the receiving, then I would be happy if I needed that function. I would highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: J.E. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great Device to Bluetooth my Apple iPod Gen 6 to my Truck
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a product that works and allows me to use my Apple iPod Gen 6 with my 2017 Ford F-150 that doesn’t have a Aux Input and only Bluetooth. I highly recommend this product. I’ve tried another product and wasted my money. This product paired to my truck’s Bluetooth quickly. I was so happy when I heard music from my iPod to my truck’s stereo. Just plug the 3.5mm Audio Jack into this product and your iPod (Audio Jack is Included). I had it on Transmitter Mode (TX Mode) in order for it to work with my truck’s Bluetooth. Includes simple instructions booklet, charge cable and Audio Adapter for Television. I also reviewed on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: "V"

customer_reviews.title: So happy to watch tv without disturbing my wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to watch tv with wireless earbuds so I don’t disturb my wife at night. This was completely new for me and after researching Bluetooth transmitters I decided to try this one. After figuring out the TINY directions I got it to work. (Had to figure out the earbuds too) This solves a big problem for me and I’m so happy I got my setup working. It does what it says it will do and that’s what I wanted. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Milauskas

customer_reviews.title: Very handy device but not too easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a few of these devices, and this seemed to be the best bet for what I needed. I needed a transmitter only to plug into my computer and watch Netflix or Prime through my Bose headphones without disturbing my family. I have both the QuietComfort 35 (series II) and Soundsport Wireless. I had to dig through a bunch of forums to find a way for my headphones to connect to the TaoTronics, but once I figured it out, it was fine. It's still fiddly, but at least it works! The key is you have to wipe out all previous connections - connect to TaoTronics, then reconnect to other devices afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Clairicito

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Clear Connection
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the transmitter connected with the Bluetooth headset I was using and is very clear, had a quick connection, and really good range. I was a bit upset when I tried to connect a different headset to it, and it wouldn't search to give me a new connection. I was going to give it a not-so-great review. THEN, I received an unsolicited email from the seller, Sunvalley Brands, with instructions on how to reset to connect with a new device. Clearly they recognized this was a problem and proactively reached out to customers to help them. Because of the device, and the seller's customer service, I give it my highest rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for analog freaks
customer_reviews.text: I found I wasn't using my cassette walkman as much since I got so sick of getting tangled up in the headphone cords when putting my bag down, etc. Looks like this thingy will change my life. Works great right out of the box (without even charging first). Paired after a few tries with my earbuds and sounds frankly incredible: great fidelity and bass, no crackling or dropouts. I also love that it's rechargeable. Considering putting some velcro pads on it & my walkman so they can stick together vs. it being loose & dangling. I used to play my tapes in the car but since I walk more than drive now, the cassette collection was getting neglected. No more!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tonkin

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable and great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this transmitter for half a year and I am so satisfied with this little transmitter. I bought this for connecting my wireless earbuds to the tv so that I can watch TV while exercising on the treadmill. I first tried fireTV and the Bluetooth transmission function of fireTV is really awful, it was hard to connect and audio was lagging behind the video. Then I bought this product to give it a try. Surprisingly, this transmitter worked perfectly! After the initial setup, it automatically connects my earbuds and no audio lagging issues any longer. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and pairing
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I was a little skeptical given the name brand and relatively cheap price when compared to other bluetooth transmitters. However let me assure you this thing works great. Bought a couple of them for my father since his hearing ain't what is used to be! Took about a minute to plug I to the TV and pair to his wireless headphones. Crystal clear reception with no lag. He is very happy as is my mother for not havi g to listen to the TV volume turned all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Savarino

customer_reviews.title: What a Music Recording Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to search for a receiver/transmitter to go along with my bluetooth headphones that have ultra low (or no) latency for my music recording goals and these definitely are excellent! My setup isn't for high-end recording of course, however, I just needed some recording equipment to lay down some guitar tracks to send to my drummer. I don't like having to juggle with so many cables around me so I'm trying to lessen the mess while recording as much as I can :). Having so many cables around kind of interferes and makes a hassle during recording for me. So these definitely help!
customer_reviews.author: Swrvl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth receiver/ transmitter is intuitive and easy to use. I have only used it in the transmit mode. the sound was clear with no static even with using it while being charged. The instructions were easy to understand. I'm 73 so I needed a good lighting and a magnifying glass to read. Paring was fairly easy squeeze the transmitter/receiver until it flashes red and blue; then hold down the Bluetooth head phones power button constantly usually you will hear "power on" from the headphones continue to hold down the power button in a few seconds you will hear "paring" from the head phones. TaoTronics and Sony headphones usually work that way.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Zych

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect keeps the family happy!
customer_reviews.text: I watch TV at night and my wife and I go to bed at different times. Often a couple hours apart. My TV is mounted on the wall in our bedroom and 10-15 feet away. That meant that I had to watch TV in the other room due to sound. I have Bluetooth headphones but my TV didn’t support Bluetooth. I ordered this transmitter and plugged it into the tv headphone jack. Synced my headphones with it in under 2 minutes and BAM!!! Sound from the transmitter to my Bluetooth headphones. Happy wife, happy life. Now we can go to bed at the same time and I no longer keep her up with loud TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ando

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these; one for a 2008 BMW and one for my boat that doesn’t have a Bluetooth stereo head unit. Each has an auxiliary (aux) port and that is all you need. I love this product. It’s well made and works great. Easy to plug in and use as well. Steaming music from my phone now in this car and on the water w/o having to replace the receivers, for what would have been much more money and time. No issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Miller-Mission

customer_reviews.title: Needs a reset sequence and an on/off sequence.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it a 5. However it would not pair with the speakers until I did the following: 1. Pair to my phone on tx mode. 2. Pair to my phone on rx mode 3. Unpair from my phone. 4. Turn off my phone's bluetooth. Then continue with the documented pairing procedure. I think those 4 steps is to clear the memory of the device. Also you can't turn it off, so it hogs the speakers until it runs out of charge the next day. What it should have are - 1 sec press to toggle on off - 10 to 20 sec press to clear bluetooth memory and initiate new pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Sylke

customer_reviews.title: I can now hear tv in mute mode while husband naps!
customer_reviews.text: I had wireless headphones so that I could watch and hear tv when my husband wanted a nap. But the transmitter on the SharperImage set quit working after a few months. So I purchased this TaoTronics transmitter in the hopes that it would pair with the old headphones. It would not . . . those headphones apparently only pair with the dedicated SharperImage transmitter. Then I purchased a new set of bluetooth headphones and the TaoTronics paired with them! Now I am delighted to hear the tv again without disturbing hubby. Also, really like the small portable size of this transmitter for traveling on airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Never paired but the seller contact me
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday I received the device at my house and tried to pair it with my JBL headset, but when I turn on the Tao Tronics the red and blue light never stops flashes and does not pair. Connect the Tao Tronics of the audio output of my Sony TV and tried to pair it with my JBL headset, but I have not succeeded, because the blue and red light does not stop flashing. The seller contacted me and gave me the guidelines to make it work. It is already working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to take advantage of the AptX low latency feature. Using to transmit audio from projector headphone output to portable speaker RCA input. Because the speaker is only about 20 feet from the projector, the latency is virtually undetectable and sound quality are fine. When using a cable to connect the projector to speaker, the sound quality is better and the volume can be turned up to very loud and painful levels. The minor issue is sound volume. When using this tandem, wireless connection, the volume is limited even when the projector volume and speaker volume controls are turned up to 100% (equivalent to about 60-70% with wired connection). Only downside preventing a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoGeek

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Well made. May not work transmitting to Apple equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few adapters of this sort. This one is the most well made of the lot, pairing is easy, it's plenty loud, and the battery life is adequate. Bear in mind that there will be a noticeable lag between audio and video if you're transmitting to an Apple device or Bose headphones. It works fine as a receiver. (I use it as a receiver for movies viewed on an iPad---converting my wired earbuds to wireless---without difficulty, but the lag when transmitting from an airplane audio jack to Bose bluetooth headphones is awful). That's Bose and Apple's problem (they both use the antique, brain-dead AAC codec exclusively), though. Works great with Sony bluetooth phones, which support the faster codecs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Holub

customer_reviews.title: Absolute perfection
customer_reviews.text: Transmits and receives excellently, great range, great battery life, extremely light and small, simple to use, this thing is LIFE. I got this for outdoor movie projector night. I don’t want the sound playing out loud so I have this connected to transmit from the aux port of my projector. Me and my wife each have wireless Bluetooth earbuds and we connected both sets simultaneously. I was initially concerned how to connect the earbuds since neither have a screen, but I simply put them next to each other in pair mode and it worked. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 month update is not a pretty one.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in Feb 2020. Works great on my radios that only have a 3.5mm output jack but it DOES NOT work on my laptop AT ALL. No matter how many times I try to pair my headphones with the adapter it WILL NOT work. Way past the return timeframe. Cannot figure out WHY it will not work on my laptop. If it only works on some devices what good is it?
customer_reviews.author: mog54

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I put this product on an older model Samsung TV that did not have bluetooth capabilities. The device worked flawlessly from the beginning. I was amazed and obviously didn't appreciate how small the product was. I plugged the USB charging cable into the USB port on the back of the TV using the charging cable provided. I connected the audio to the RCA jacks on the TV using the 3.5mm Audio Cable and the 3.5mm Female to 2 RCA Male Cable supplied (see photo). The TaoTronics device is small and lightweight. I stuck it on the side of the TV with double sided tape. This allows for easy access to the button on the transmitter when pairing.
customer_reviews.author: rx21825

customer_reviews.title: Latency or delay, is unacceptably long.
customer_reviews.text: Latency is a huge problem. If you use it for playing musical instruments without bothering others, forget it. The delay is ridiculously long for this application. For TV, if you don’t mind sound being off from picture it’s ok. For Bluetooth earbuds, music only, I’m sure it’s fine. I didn’t test the sound quality BC I already have BT earbuds. For my application (playing guitar) completely worthless. Huge disappointment. 3 stars because it does transmit a signal, is easy to connect and would work for listing to music only, but useless for other applications.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalobwana

customer_reviews.title: I use it with airpods!
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my airpods with the television receiver when I'm doing my workouts. My BF doesn't like the music on the dvds and all the shouted instructions but I want to be able to hear it loud for motivation... This keeps us both happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R Torres

customer_reviews.title: I can hear clearly now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to connect to my television to watch movies with headphones. The transmission is in stereo and is capable of transmitting throughout the house. The battery lasts a long time upon charging. The sound quality through the headphones is really good, and I’m able to hear things much more clearly than using my stereo surround sound speaker system. It transmits to two headphones at a time, so now my spouse and I can watch movies together, without struggling to hear everything in the movie. We can individually adjust the volume on the headphones. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: CalTalWrite18

customer_reviews.title: Great for cars with no Bluetooth but have AUX input
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Using this in a 2010 Toyota RAV4 via AUX port and connects quickly. Using only in receiver mode (music streaming from my iPhone). Cables that are included (headphone and usb charging cable) are the perfect length to connect to usb plug that I put into cigarette lighter spot and connect to this device to constantly charge while car is on.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal resident

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine With Two Headsets
customer_reviews.text: (Review written after 10 days of use) Works perfectly well. We sit about 7 feet from the TV, a Sharp lc-55p6000u. The Techtronics is permanently plugged in to a charger. Once you get the headsets paired, they stay paired (unless you use one or the other to pair with some other device). There is no noticeable latency even with two headsets. One of us is slightly deaf so it is great to able to adjust the headset volume on one set without affecting the other. And since the speakers aren't used there is no disturbance to others in the house or to condo neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: roy.g.biv

customer_reviews.title: Sweet: works very nicely
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with transmitting music to my component stereo system from my laptop, about 20 ft away. Tried several devices, none of which worked without cutouts in the music. This device works perfectly, and, as far as I can tell, is idiot-proof. I connected it to the headphone jack of my laptop and the charging USB port. Oh, the sweet music! The size of the device worried me when I unboxed it. Nominally 1.77 x 1.3 x 0.35 in., and they claim 5 W power. I was skeptical. No more. Can't go wrong with this little giz.
customer_reviews.author: G. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: 1 + 1 = 0 working!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought first on 16 DEC 2018, it failed. one and TaoTronics then sent me a " free replacement when the first unit failed 26 Jan 2019. Now that second unit failed. Same symptoms on both failure, still connects to phone, no audio output... FYI I had also purchased a Logitech Bluetooth Audio Adapter for Bluetooth Streaming; that unit still works and I am going to buy another Logitech Bluetooth Audio Adapter for Bluetooth Streaming as they seam to work while two TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver have failed for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: 2 Bluetooth Headphones - 1 iPad
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and have been wishing there was a way for you and your wife to watch movies on a plane and both use your bluetooth headphones, this is it! Its kind of confusing at first on how to pair two headphones, but just make sure to read the instructions and you will be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: A must for motorcycle helmet
customer_reviews.text: If don't have one it's about time. I use the tiny bluetooth 5.0 transmitter with a headphone amplifier to deliver better and stringer sound to my Shoei Neotec II. One may say: Neotec II has bluetooth :)) .. correct but the signal is weak .. The schematics look like this: My Iphone 11 Pro to amplifier Amplifier to bluetooth transmitter Pair bluetooth to the helmet Switch them on Start the music and you have control of the bluetooth signal. Now I can ride 80 mph and still have music in my helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service helped...
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: Had some issues w/ initial unit, but customer service went out of their way to make it right. Initial Review: First one received had very low sound quality which only came across through one channel, (one side on 2 different headphones attempted) Sent it back & Seller replaced with a USED UNIT!!!! Tried it anyway: Bluetooth connectivity is dicey; connected to kid's hoverboard Bluetooth and others before getting it to connect to headphones - could only get it to connect to one set & not the other. Once connected, sound is decent - but just been a lot of trouble
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth transmitter and receiver!
customer_reviews.text: I am using the TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver as a bluetooth transmitter for a Sansa Clip for use in my 2004 Ford Thunderbird with the FM Transmitter with Bluetooth capability. It works flawlessly. It is also great for use while exercising with my bluetooth headphones. No wires to get in the way!. I am very pleased with the size of the TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter. It is very small, about the size of my Sansa Clip only slimmer. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USB power
customer_reviews.text: My TV is only 6 months old. When I plug this Bluetooth device to it, the TV shorts out and turns off. I tried twice to make sure it wasn't a coincidence. Luckily I could plug the USB into a stand alone plug. This devices is transmitting now but with lag. I tried it on my satellite receiver and on my DVD player all have lag. I may have to call shenanigans on the "aptX Low Latency" claim. I'm just glad my TV came back on. I was afraid this thing fried the internals.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Abney

customer_reviews.title: Wow...I've been missing out...so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: The TV in my exercise room never gets loud enough despite volume maxed out, it's a cheap TV without bluetooth so I live with it during every DVD workout and just get more annoyed. I hit my limit last week and decided to try this transmitter paired to my bluetooth wireless earbuds. I was blown away immediately. It paired on the first try and I am beyond impressed at the new volume level...I had to actually turn down my headphones for the first time ever. This brings a new level of focus and motivation to my workouts and I wish I bought this years ago. Definitely recommend it to anyone needing more volume for a cheaper TV
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reeds

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC & FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Installation: simple, straightforward with instant results. Tech support previous to purchase: excellent. Sound? Great in that we run classical music from internet station located in Europe...good for discerning ears...and we are running a powerful amplifier that pushes serious juice to two AR-3a classic 1960s 8ohm speakers. Use? Turn on laptop, turn on stereo amplifier, press and hold for a bit the start button on the TaoTronics transmitter (for the laptop) and receiver (for the amplifier)...select the internet station and ... VOILA! ... Music for the ears. Sometimes there's no hesitation on giving a good review. This is one of those times. Unreservedly LOVING IT!
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Well worth $30
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to turn my 15-year-old 75 W fender guitar amp into a Bluetooth ready soundsystem. Took about two seconds to sync with my phone with no worries about Alexa responding to everything I say – whether or not directed to her. And no problems with it randomly activating other Bluetooth devices in my house. Can give no stars for sound quality because, well, sound comes from my speaker; same with volume control. When I calculated the price of a Sonos, Apple, Bose, or Marshall smart speaker, I figure for $30 I saved about $307.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Guy

customer_reviews.title: Get pair to stream music from inside to outside.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality solution to stream our non-bluetooth indoor audio setup outside without paying an arm and a leg for a new Sonos type system and this fit the bill. Bought a pair of them, set one to transmit (plug into audio out or use an adapter to convert line-out to 1/8 phono plug) and the other to receive and plug into the AUX input. It was very easy to set up the bluetooth and sounds great. Plug into anything with an aux input and you can stream music. I couldn't be happier with the decison. I'll definitely buy from TT again.
customer_reviews.author: TechDad99

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up for the first time yesterday to try it out, and im impressed by the sound quality. This is an initial review. Update as of 8-7-20. I personally have nothing negative to say about this product. The bluetooth 5.0 frequency pushes the sound of my pandora thru the vehicle speakers crystal clear and way better than any auxiliary cord I've ever used. I just can't use it in my semi which is what I bought it for bc the stupid truck shuts the radio off periodically while I'm driving so nothing bad about this product. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok for a couple years, then died.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Customer service contacted me and offered a refund, even after so much time had passed. They obviously stand behind their products, and I respect that. Increased rating to 4 STARS. This is an End Of Life review. After a couple years of using this adapter, it went into a weird flashy mode that wouldn't turn off...and stayed that way until the battery died. It worked OK while it worked. There was too much lag for my taste, and the audio quality was average. The volume levels were OK, but probably would be best paired with an amplifier...so why not just buy a bluetooth adapter with a built in amp? 3 stars for 2 years of average use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Lightning dongles
customer_reviews.text: This works better than expected. I needed something that would allow me to use my wired noise - cancelling headphones with my iPhone X. I’ve used numerous lightning to audio dongles and all of them were bad - either flaky from the start or didn’t last long. This transmitter works great, I can just plug in my headphones and keep it in my pocket. It lets me listen to my music regardless of whether my phone is plugged in on the other side of the room, or even if I need to leave the room for a minute. The range seems good and I have no complaints any audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Ever, Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and received product, failed to connect to my Amazon purchased Sony Noise Cancelling Headphones WH1000XM3: Wireless Bluetooth Over the Ear Headphones which are the best on the market currently. Sent back and recieved 2nd product that again failed to pair with my new headphones purchased from Amazon. There are only three steps to allegedly pair device so I can't believe that it was my issue following directions. This was a total waste of time on a product that obviously doesn't function as advertised. Now I have to wait for a week to get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Really!

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Transmitter and Receiver, 2-in-1 Wireless 3.5mm Adapter (aptX Low Latency, 2 Devices Simultaneously, for TV/Home Sound System/Nintendo Switch)
product_meta.description:
TX mode:
In the TX mode, the Bluetooth transmitter can be used to stream audio from non-Bluetooth audio sources such as non-Bluetooth TVs or CD players to Bluetooth headphones/speakers. This transmitter is supported to RCA connectors and AUX connectors, therefore, please kindly have a check see whether your audio sources have one of these kinds of jacks. Please note that the adapter should be plugged into the “L&R AUDIO OUT” jack or the “AUX OUT” jack on the audio source but not the “Component IN” jack.

RX mode:
In the RX mode, the Bluetooth adapter could be used as a Bluetooth receiver to non-Bluetooth stereos such as wired headsets or wired speakers. Pair the Bluetooth receiver with your cell phone, and plug your headsets into the jack on this unit, then you will be able to hear the music from your phone.

NOTE：
If the TV does not have the “AUX OUT” jack or the “L&R AUDIO OUT” jack, a headphone jack should also work.
If the TV only have a “DIGITAL AUDIO OUTPUT (OPTICAL)” jack, a convertor is needed or you could choose another model of TaoTronics Bluetooth Transmitters, TT-BA09, which is supported to both aux audio output and optical audio output.
Not recommend for streaming live music (while playing guitar, keyboard, electronic drums etc.)

What is In the Box:

feature_bullets: LOW DELAY: aptX Low Latency for High-fidelity Stereo Sound, lag-free content streaming in transmitter mode. Low Latency supported Bluetooth headphones/speakers are required.
MAKE IT TWO: Upgraded 2-in-1 Bluetooth V5.0 transmitter can be paired with two Bluetooth receivers (like headphones + speakers) simultaneously. Note: aptX Low Latency does NOT support Dual Link mode.
ALWAYS ON: TaoTronics Bluetooth 2-in-1 Adapter continuously streams even while charging. Built-in battery for up to 10 hours use - enjoy your favorite wireless content all the time.
BLUETOOTH EVERYWHERE: In Transmitter mode, turn a non-Bluetooth TV, PC, CD player, iPod, MP3 / MP4 into Bluetooth transmitter. Receiver mode: Ideal for home or vehicle music streaming sound system.
PURE SOUND: high definition codec for a richer and deeper sound experience. Listen to CD-like audio quality at no compromise. Plus, 12 + 18 month extended warranty and 24/7 friendly customer service
